Name: Mitsos
Review Text: They say, that you can get the best gyros in amsterdam here. I do not know about that, but their gyros is epic! Will be back for more! Great price, amazing food.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Honestly the best Greek food in Amsterdam.  His food is just like my giagias food. Self imported olive oil from Kreta is his go to. Good quality ingredients make his food the best for me. My girl and I eat his food 2x week. Souvlaki with ‚Ä¶

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: There's something special about the Greek dining experience, and Mitsos Greek Traterie lives up to it. Delicious home made food and lovely service. Even though the space is small and has limited seating, we were not rushed by the staff to ‚Ä¶

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: We stumbled upon this place while visiting. This is the type of places I like to find when traveling. Cozy, family owned, friendly, and very delicious. The family is super nice and they all cook! A must-visit eatery!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Really nice Greek food. Looked homemade, quite a few choices and original as well. Highly recommended. They also have nice products for sale there.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Oh that's been very long since I haven't been to Mitsos, but I always felt in family there... great food, great owners, great ambiance, loving couple and real greek food! You cannot miss it if you want some sun in Amsterdam, that's where ‚Ä¶

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Really good quality authentic greek food!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Good food, incredibly kind staff who will happily explain every option available. Grab a gyro and eat it here with some Mandarin juice to wash it down - incredibly good value too

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Cannot rave enough about this place. Delicious, homey Greek food. We tried octopus salad (zingy and fresh), salmon lasagne (a unique treat), zuchinni cutlets, stuffed bell pepper (delicately spiced, perfectly cooked) and mixed olives. If ‚Ä¶

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great food at this place run by great people. The dishes have that comfy greek homemade quality, so tasty!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text:
These incredible people know how to cook with LOVE!
You taste their care and fresh ingredients with every mouthful.
You are presented with a vast array of taste sensations to choose from with ‚Ä¶

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Nice homemade food, you can find several greek recipes like moussaka. Super nice quality!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Loved this place ! Highly recommended. Staff is very kind, and the food was absolutely golden :)

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great food! Highly recommended it üëå

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: This place is top-notch! It has everything a Greek restaurant needs: a variety of good starters, decent, home-cooked and (in my eyes) authentic main courses,  gentle Greek music playing in the background and a chef that appears to be in it with all her heart.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Absolutely excellent, 100% authentic Greek cuisine. Go for the food, return for the lovely owners (and the "wear a jacket! You'll get a cold!" comments üòÇ)

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Most delicious Greek food in town with products (e.g. honey) brought directly from the island of Crete.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Best Greek restaurant outside of Greece. Delicious food and friendly staff. The restaurant itself is small and Cody which adds to the experience. It's almost like you are a guest in the kitchen.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great service and delicious food! I was there 2 years ago and I remember that I had a blast with my friends üôåüèº

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Had the vegetarian pita here and it's delicious!!! Definitely coming back to try the other ones

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: I‚Äôve been here so many times that I lost count. I love the atmosphere as it reminds me of the Greek hospitality I‚Äôm so familiar with. The couple that runs this place is very friendly. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Delicious greek food. Linzen soup a must and also aubergine filled with mashed potato. You can bring your own packaging for take away

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Very good home made greek specialty and very attentive service. I will definitely come again. Thank you so much for the quality of the food and your kindness

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: This Greek restaurant knocked my socks off!!! You can get warm pita bread, stuffed aubergine/paprikas, the moussaka is to die for and then reincarnate as a Cretan. I am not joking.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Perfect place to taste Mediterranean food. Owners (family run business) are extremely friendly and helpful. You can find really tasty mezes (tapas in Spanish term) along with the food.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Very tasty food and really like in greece .. but no is not so cheap and miss pita gyros gor takeaway.... :( but all the best ...

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Delicious Greek specialties and very nice owners!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: The closest to Greek food and mentality I ve found in Amsterdam ! One can also buy some traditional Greek products while the quality to price ratio is really amazing !

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: One of the best Greek restaurants around. Fair to low prices vs. what you get. I usually get take-away. There are also few tables. Try vegetarian mousaka.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Authentic Greek flavours, honestly felt like home! Amazing.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: I had some really good pitas there. But the vegetarian one was not that good. They microwaved the "meat" and put it in the pita... But the chicken was real nice.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great, authentic Greek food at a good price. My favorite takeaway place in the neighborhood (there are tables too). Love the kofte.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Simply the best take-away in Amsterdam. Good food, with enough variation. The gyros is a bit too fatty though, could be improved.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Stumbled upon this lovely little place as we were trying to get out of the awful rain-snow downpour. Fantastic and authentic Greek experience and very friendly owner who speaks perfect English. Nothing but full five stars from me.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Very cosy place serving traditional Greek food.... Much nicer than any food I ate in Mykonos! Owners are lovely and the souvlaki wrap is great for a hangover!!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Excellent choice for Greek delicatessen in the center of Amsterdam! Try the Greek pita and the cooked treats. You won't get disappointed!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Best Greek food in Amsterdam. Just delicious. Additionnely, the owners and their daughters are super nice people.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Nice takeaway, nice prices. Food that we tasted was nice: tsatsiky and others greek specialities were home made and delicious. I recommand it. There's one little table to eat in.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: I am Greek - the food is very Greek and delicious.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Real greek food for a fair price. The owner knows about wine also and he has some pretty decent (and of course greek) ones there.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text:
Very cozy place with great food.
The owners are very friendly and chatty.
It's a must for greek home made food.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Is it possible to put more than 5 stars? This is one of my favorite spots in Amsterdam. Excellent food, great service.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Food is fantastic. Service is great.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: After all those years Mitsos is still great small cosy little restaurant. Never disappoints.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Probably the best place for Greek food around Amsterdam. Always trying new recipes that make us feel like home üòä

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great Greek homemade food to take away or stay in one of the couple of tables they have. There's something new in the menu everyday to try.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great Greek home made food!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: I felt like home ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you very much! Everything amazing, so fresh!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Delicious pita gyros and such friendly owners :)

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: The decor isn't much, but the food is delicious and authentic. For a modest price you'll eat like a king!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Best Greek food I' ve ever tried outside Greece and host representing Greek hospitality at its best!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: This is easily the best greek place in amsterdam, I've lived here long enough to know!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: We love the food, ambience and mostly the people here, feels like home.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Best Greek food in town and lovely people!  My favorite In Amsterdam!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Best greek food in Amsterdam, owner looks grumpy but is nice at end üôÇ

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Delicious & Authentic Greek Food

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great place, friendly staff, super tasty food and big portions!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Really good Greek-Cretan food, very welcoming faces!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great food here. Pack up and get it for home for a warm experience

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Wonderful owner s with fantastic food! Xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo great place!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Authentic food, good prices and an adorable couple running the place.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Greek takeaway, very kind owners,delicious lamb dishes.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Love love love this place. Seriously the best food in Amsterdam ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Gyros were amazing. Great takeaway food.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Amazing Greek deli. One of my go-to places.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Great food, cooked the healthy Greek way!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Friendly staff and fresh, delicious products.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Good food : tasty, quality. Homemade of course

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Lovely Greek takeaway family restaurant in West.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: very, very tasty Greek food and kind service.

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Amazing place!

Name: Mitsos
Review Text: Best Greek restaurant in Amsterdam by far!

Name: Mitsos
